experience.title: 20 Years of Excellence
experience.description: With two decades of experience in the industrial machinery field, we've established ourselves as leaders in providing cutting-edge solutions for manufacturing businesses of all sizes.

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Discover our comprehensive range of industrial machinery. From wood processing to metal cutting, we provide high-quality solutions for every manufacturing need.
products.categoriesSubtitle: Select a category to explore our specialized machinery collections

wood.pageDescription: Explore our comprehensive range of wood processing machinery. From CNC machining centers to dust collection systems, we offer complete solutions for the woodworking industry.
wood.subcategoriesSubtitle: Select a category to view our specialized wood processing equipment
wood.cncDescription: Advanced CNC machines for precise wood processing

glassAluminium.pageDescription: Discover our premium selection of aluminum and glass processing machinery. From CNC machining centers to crimping machines, we provide complete solutions for the aluminum and glass industry.
glassAluminium.subcategoriesSubtitle: Select a category to view our specialized aluminum and glass processing equipment
glassAluminium.cncDescription: Advanced CNC centers for aluminum and glass processing
glassAluminium.copyRouterDescription: Copy router machines for profile duplication
glassAluminium.endMillingDescription: End milling machines for aluminum profiles

metal.pageDescription: Explore our advanced metal processing machinery. From fiber laser cutting to press brakes, we offer cutting-edge solutions for the metal fabrication industry.
metal.subcategoriesSubtitle: Select a category to view our specialized metal processing equipment
metal.laserDescription: High-precision fiber laser cutting for metal sheets
metal.pressBrakeDescription: CNC press brake machines for metal bending
metal.shearDescription: Industrial shearing machines for metal cutting

airCompressor.pageDescription: Explore our range of industrial air compressors. From screw type to piston compressors, we provide reliable compressed air solutions for every application.
airCompressor.subcategoriesSubtitle: Select a category to view our air compressor solutions

footer.description: Providing high-quality industrial machinery solutions for over 20 years. Your trusted partner in manufacturing excellence.
